pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Django Rebel## Requirements- Django >= 2.0- Postgresql## Installation```pip install django-rebel```Add `django_rebel` to your INSTALLED_APPS setting.```INSTALLED_APPS = ( ... 'django_rebel',)```Add Django Rebel settings to your settings file.```REBEL = { "TEST_MODE": False, "SEARCH_FIELDS": [], "EMAIL_PROFILES": { 'MARKETING': { 'EMAIL': "anyone@example.com", 'FULL_NAME': 'Anyone', "API": { "API_KEY": "MAILGUN_API_KEY", "DOMAIN": "mg.example.com" } } }}```
